name: The Emperor (V)
Lore: 'Leader. Secretive manipulator of the galaxy. Played Darth Vader and Prince Xizor off against one another in his relentless pursuit of ''young Skywalker''.',
Text: 'Never deploys or moves (even if carried) to a non-Senate site opponent occupies. Each turn, may lose 1 Force (free in battle) to target a character present with him. Draw destiny. Target lost if destiny +1 > defense value. Gains [Republic] at opponent''s Senate.',
